mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_advertisement(product_id, status, rank, date) VALUES (#{productId}, 0, 0, now());
mapper.select: SELECT product_advertisement.id AS adId, product_id, product_advertisement.status AS adStatus, rank, date, name, price, category_id FROM product_advertisement JOIN product ON product_advertisement.product_id=product.id WHERE product_advertisement.status=1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product_advertisement WHERE status=1

SELECT product_advertisement.id AS adId, product_id, product_advertisement.status AS adStatus, rank, date, name, price, category_id FROM product_advertisement JOIN product ON product_advertisement.product_id=product.id WHERE product_advertisement.status=0 limit #{start}, #{pageNum}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product_advertisement WHERE status=0
